Jumping to Next/Previous element in Doubly Linked List
begin BubbleSort(list)  for all elements of list if list[i] > list[i+1] swap(list[i], list[i+1])end if end for return list    end BubbleSort

step 1: start       step 2: declare array and left, right, mid variable    step 3: perform merge function.        if left > right    return         mid= (left+right)/2        mergesort(array, left, mid)        mergesort(array, mid+1, right)     merge(array, left, mid, right)     step 4: Stop
